mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (id, user_id, password, username, profile_img, age, gender, address) VALUES ( UUID(), #{userId}, #{password}, #{username}, COALESCE(#{profileImg}, '/static/img/default-profile.png'), #{age}, COALESCE(#{gender}, '공개안함'), #{address} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users u JOIN ( SELECT DATE(created_at) AS latest_date FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1 ) t ON u.created_at >= t.latest_date AND u.created_at < t.latest_date + INTERVAL 1 DAY
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
